Narrative:
The argument around building a conducive environment for a child to learn and succeed is necessary.
Therefore, the education system plays an essential role.
We can't underestimate or annihilate schools' presence because they do a lot for children.
But working on how their learning ambience is set and the education is delivered is essential.
The focus should be more on building concrete skills and making students learn even the most futile history lessons excitingly.

Luckily a part of the world comprehends this problem that school has an inappropriate way of delivering education, and the work is continuously being done to bring a change in classroom learning.

It is no longer confined to the thresholds of conventional methods; the work is done to make it exciting and attractive.

So the debate should be more inclined toward the classroom ambience and deliverance of teaching instead of proving school is a waste because it is not.
At the end of the day, we all have become something with the ways and manners our school taught us.
Festivals: ['Pan African Film & Arts Festival 2022', 'Atlanta Film Festival 2022', 'Milwaukee Film Festival 2022']
Title: The argument around building a conducive environment for learning is more essential
